p: We can also use this analysis to consider the expected intensity of the most extreme events which might be experienced in the future (Figure 4, for 100‐ and 500‐year events). We find that in all clusters, 500‐year events will become more intense in a warmer world, but some clusters show more dramatic results than others. Clusters on the U.S. East Coast show a more than doubling of the intensity of a 500‐year event, whereas the western states cluster, for example, shows less of a dramatic change in the intensity of 500‐year events.
